Our Portfolio

Explore our collection of beautifully staged homes, showcasing our signature style and attention to detail. Each space is thoughtfully designed to highlight its best features and create an inviting atmosphere that appeals to buyers. Browse through our portfolio to see the range of decor styles and transformations we can bring to your home.

Bohemian

Add warmth, creativity, and character to your space with our Bohemian-inspired home decor. Our Bohemian staging option is thoughtfully styled to appeal to buyers seeking character, comfort, and artistic charm.

Minimalist

Minimalist decor emphasizes clean lines, open spaces, and a neutral color palette to create a calm and uncluttered environment. Our minimalist staging option presents a refined and modern aesthetic that appeals to a broad range of buyers.

Rustic

Rustic decor brings warmth and charm to a space through the use of earthy tones, and vintage textures. Our rustic staging option is thoughtfully designed to enhance a home's character and appeal.

Farmhouse

Farmhouse decor blends traditional charm with modern comfort, it features natural wood finishes, neutral tones, and cozy furnishings. Our farmhouse staging option highlights a home's comfort and character, appealing to buyers looking for a relaxed yet stylish atmosphere.

Contemporary

Contemporary decor showcases open spaces and a moderate use of color and materials to create a sleek, modern aesthetic. Our contemporary staging option presents a simple and sophisticated feel that resonates with today's modern buyers.

Shabby Chic

Shabby Chic decor combines vintage elegance with a soft, romantic charm. Featuring distressed finishes and antique-inspired furnishings, this style creates a warm and inviting atmosphere that feels both timeless and comfortable.
